# isProducedByAccessory

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the system receives the location from an external accessory.

## Declaration

```swift
var isProducedByAccessory: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

Core Location sets [doc://com.apple.corelocation/documentation/CoreLocation/CLLocationSourceInformation/isProducedByAccessory] to `true` if the system retrieved the location from an external accessory attached to the device, such as a Made for iPhone GPS dongle or CarPlay. Otherwise, the default value is `false`.

## Identifying the source of location data

- **isSimulatedBySoftware**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the system generates the location using on-device software simulation.
